Brand Identity2024

TechFlow Brand Identity

Complete visual identity system for innovative fintech startup

üé®

Project Details

Client

TechFlow Inc.

Role

Creative Director & Lead Designer

Duration

3 months

Team

  • Alex Creative (Lead)
  • Sarah Johnson (Strategy)
  • Mike Chen (Development)

Tools Used

Adobe Creative SuiteFigmaPrincipleAfter Effects

Tags

Brand StrategyLogo DesignVisual IdentityDigital DesignFintech

The Challenge

TechFlow needed a sophisticated brand identity that would appeal to both tech-savvy millennials and established financial institutions, while differentiating them in the crowded fintech space.

The Solution

We developed a dynamic visual system based on the concept of 'fluid innovation' - using flowing geometric patterns that represent both technology and financial flow, paired with a modern yet trustworthy color palette.

The Results

40% increase in brand recognition within 6 months

Successfully raised $15M Series A funding

Featured in TechCrunch and Forbes

300% growth in user acquisition
